title: "It's not my job to win your lane"
body:
Sure it's not your job to do anything but hit monsters, but I'll tell you as someone who has been a jungle main for the last 4 seasons and has hit diamond in the last 3, if you can't at least put some basic pressure down like warding for your lanes and pinging for your team you're hot trash. As a jungler there's always something that you can do, especially in low elo.

So if you're gold and you are 0/0/0 at 15 mins whining that your team is blaming you for them losing maybe you should take it to heart and evaluate your play.
